sec.div: (d) Relationship between BMR and M SUM
sec.p: Linear regression between residuals of whole BMR and whole M SUM extracted from linear mixed effect models resulted in a significant but weak positive relationship between these parameters (n = 269; r ² adj = 0.04; p < 0.001). The relationship was not significant when using residuals from models controlling for body mass (p = 0.4).
